trait.name: Evasion
entries: When subjected to an effect that allows a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Molliver takes no damage on a successful save or half damage on a failed one, provided Molliver is not {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Molliver wears  +1 leather armor and boots of levitation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Molliver makes two Dagger or Shortsword attacks, or one of each.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. The attack deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage if Molliver has advantage on the attack roll or if the target is within 5 feet of one of Molliver's allies.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. The attack deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage if Molliver has advantage on the attack roll or if the target is within 5 feet of one of Molliver's allies.

action.name: Levitate
entries: While wearing boots of levitation, Molliver casts {@spell levitate} (self only).

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: Molliver halves the damage they take from an attack made against them, provided they can see the attacker.
